knimeNode.name: MS Level Filter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Removes all but the selected MS scans from the specified input file. Converts input file to the chosen data format.
knimeNode.fullDescription: Removes all but the selected MS scans from the specified input file. Converts input file to the chosen data format.

ports.outPort: MS/MS spectra from each file are automatically loaded into the output table, similar to the Spectra Reader node.
Contains descriptive metadata about each file loaded.
